articles.title: Apple sues Ukrainian director over indie comedy film titled ‘Apple-Man’ - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Apple has filed a lawsuit against Ukrainian indie film director Vasyl Moskalenko, who wrote the comedy film titled 'Apple-Man.'
articles.content: We are used to seeing Apple involved in multiple legal disputes regarding its products and services, but this one is a bit different. The Cupertino-based company has filed a lawsuit against Ukrainian… [+1846 chars]
